Interface TagManagementDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TagManagementDAOImpl

    public interface TagManagementDAO
    DAO interface for the tag management service.

      • loadTag

        Tag loadTag(String tagUuid,
            String tenantUuid)
     throws TagServiceException
        Retrieve tag data with the given UUID.
        Parameters:
        tagUuid - UUID of the tag.
        tenantUuid - UUID of the tenant.
        Returns:
        Tag.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting tag data.

      • loadTag

        Tag loadTag(String name,
            String type,
            String tenantUuid)
     throws TagServiceException
        Retrieve tag data with the given name and tag type.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        type - Type of the tag.
        tenantUuid - UUID of the tenant.
        Returns:
        Tag.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting the tag attributes.

      • filterTags

        TagListResponse filterTags(int limit,
                           int offset,
                           String filter,
                           String tenantUuid)
                    throws TagServiceException
        Filter a list of tags by type and name.
        Parameters:
        limit - Number of results to be retrieved.
        offset - Offset.
        filter - Tag type and name filter.
        tenantUuid - UUID of the tenant.
        Returns:
        TagListResponse.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting the tags list.

               String name,

        Parameters:
        tagUuid - UUID of tag.
        name - Name of the tag Tag.
        description - Description of the tag Tag.
        isPubliclyVisible - Public visibility of the tag Tag.
        tenantUuid - UUID of the tenant.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while deleting the tag.
